title: Cloud XR with Hand Tracking
description: Developed as a proof of concept for a talk given at Nvidia's GTC conference, this demo showcased how hand tracking data processed on a standalone headset could be transmitted to a server running CloudXR.

title: Combining Eye and Hand Tracking
description: Part of an early collaboration with Tobii exploring the combination of hand tracking and eye tracking. In this demo, an orange ball tracks the user's gaze in the virtual world.</br></br>

title: Interactive Home Surfaces
description: Designed as part of a proof of concept to explore natural user interfaces for smart homes. This demo utilized a short-throw projector with an attached hand-tracking device to enable natural interactions on any projected surface.

title: Interactive Tabletop Experiences
description: Developed to explore potential collaboration with Tilt5, this project investigated the integration of hand tracking into augmented tabletop experiences.</br></br>

title: Hand Tracking over the Network with Embedded Compute
description: Part of an exploration into embedded compute and networked hand tracking data that enabled hand tracking on compute/IO-limited devices such as smartphones and media players.

title: VR Desktop Computing
description: Designed to explore accessing traditional file systems in virtual reality using hand tracking interfaces.</br></br</br></br></br>
